channel.title: 508 command needed
channel.description: Hello! Can someone give me the code for the "master" command on a 508 server? (99 level up all skills!) Thank you!

item.title: 508 command needed
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:2, topic:265733”] if (cmd[0].equals("master")) { p.addSkillXP(13400000, 0); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 1); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 2); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 3); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 4); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 5); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 6); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 7); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 8); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 9); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 10); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 11); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 12); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 13); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 14); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 15); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 16); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 17); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 18); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 19); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 20); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 21); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 22); p.addSkillXP(13400000, 23); }[/quote]
Please read this.

for(int i=0; i<24; i++){
    p.addSkillXP(13400000, i);
}
